Mwelu is requesting this loan to be able to expand the business. She’s grateful for this opportunity because with it, she's making progress.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, potatoes, oranges, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Asliddin

texts.ru: Аслиддину 25 лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Он очень энергичный и целеустремленный человек. Жена Аслиддина добрая и порядочная женщина. Она работает и получает маленькую зарплату, которая не хватает для обеспечения семьи. Поэтому Аслиддин является основным кормильцем в семье. Уже несколько лет он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как пшеницу и другие зерновые культуры. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Он сам справляется с бизнесом. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 сомони, чтобы купить минерального удобрения. У него очень большие планы будущим, если он будет получать хороший урожай, то от полученного дохода, купит все не обходимые техники, которым его семья нуждается много лет. Он добропорядочный человек и обещает погасить займ во время. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Asliddin is twenty-five, married, and raising two children.  He is a very energetic and motivated person.  His wife is a good and proper woman.  She works for a small salary that isn't enough to provide for the family, so Asliddin is the family's main breadwinner.  For a number of years he has earned his living growing crops, like wheat, and various grains, which he sells at the market.  He manages his own business.  He would like to expand the business in order to provide his family with all its needs, so he has to harvest a higher yield.  He is seeking a loan for 2000 soms to buy mineral fertilizers.  He's got big plans for the future if he gets a good harvest; once he makes the income he'll buy essential equipment that his family has needed for many years.  Asliddin is a respectable man and promises to pay off the loan on time.  He needs and awaits your beneficence.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Farruh

texts.ru: Фарруху 25 лет. Местные жители знают его как честного человека, так как он всегда выполняет свои обещания. Фаррух женат. Он живет вместе женой и родителями. Он имеет 1 ребенка, и мечтает, чтобы он по быстрее стал взрослым и хорошим человеком. С целью получения дохода, Фаррух 1 год назад начал свой бизнес скотоводством. В основном он занимается выращиванием крупно - рогатого скота. Для него очень интересно заниматься скотоводством, так как он с детства любил домашних животных. Часть корма для скота он выращивает сам дома и часть приобретает на рынке. Он держит скот несколько месяцев. Фаррух продает скот, за которым он присматривался в течение нескольких месяцев. На рынке у него много клиентов. Его отец помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Фаррух хочет развивать свой бизнес, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  3000  сомони для покупки скота, чтобы развевать бизнес. От полученного дохода он хочет улучшить условию проживания, а также создать условию дома для его ребенка. Он очень добросовестный человек и обещает погасить займ во время. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Farruh is 25 years old.  The locals know him to be an honest man since he always fulfills his promises.  Farruh is married and they live with his parents.  He has a young child, and he hopes his child will quickly grow into a good person.  With an aim to earning an income, a year ago Farruh began his busineess in cattle raising.  Primarily, he raises large, horned cattle.  He takes a great interest in cattle raising and he has loved domesticated animals since his childhood.  He grows some of his cattle's feed himself, and he buys some of it at the market.  He keeps and cares for the cattle for several months before selling them at the market.  He has many clients there.  His father helps him run the business.

Farruh wants to develop his business, but he doesn't have sufficient financial means for this.  He is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy cattle in order to develop his business.  With the profit he makes, he wants to improve the family's living conditions and to fit out their home for his child.  He is a very conscientious man and he promises to repay the loan on time.  He is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle to resell

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Con el deseo de superarse y ayudar a sus familias, 12 mujeres de la ciudad de Caaguazú se unieron y de ahí surge este grupo que se llama La esperanza, ya que con mucha esperanza estas mujeres estas trabajando y se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Agustina una de ellas, se dedica a la venta de prendas usadas, comenta ella que sus ventas están muy bien, ya que las prendas de segunda mano están cada vez mejor, ya que son más baratas y son mas preferidas. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y que quiere seguir creciendo para poder ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas, para poder venderlas y de esa forma seguir dando buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Twelve women from the city of Caaguazú got together with the desire to improve themselves and help their families.  This is how the group called La Esperanza ["Hope"] developed, because these women work with a lot of hope and help each other mutually.

One of them, Agustina, makes a living selling used clothing.  She says her sales are very good because second-hand garments are better all the time, cheaper and more desirable.  She's a very hardworking person who wants to continue growing to be able to help her family.

She's requesting this loan to buy clothes to sell so she can continue giving her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to buy used clothing

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 35 years old and lives in the town of Iganga in the Iganga region of Uganda. He is married and has two children, who are both currently in school. For the past one year, James has been working hard to manage his retail shop, which sells sugar, salt and cooking oil. 

To help expand his business, James has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to increase his stock of essential commodities such as milk, cooking oil, sugar and salt to attract more customers. This will help James to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. James hopes that in the future, he will be able to build a commercial house. 

James is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like James who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to increase stock of essential commodities such as milk, cooking oil, sugar and salt to attract more customers.

loans.name: Ismatullo

texts.ru: Исматулло житель Пянджского района. Он женат, ему 42 года. У него 4 детей. Исматулло занимается разведением мелкого скота. Он хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота.
texts.en: Ismatullo is a resident of the Pyandj region.  He is 42 years old, married, and has four children.  Ismatullo raises small cattle.  He wants to increase the size of his herd.

loans.use: to increase the size of his herd

loans.name: Yassah

texts.en:
Yassah lives in Montserrado County, noted for the having within its boundaries the most commercial city in Liberia (Monrovia). Yassah is 23 years old and has a four-year-old child that is in school. For the past six years, Yassah has been selling rice, peppers, palm oil, and other items on a table. 

One problem Yassah faces is the rainy season. She enjoys the interaction with her customers and the profit she makes. The business keeps her busy and makes her proud. 

Yassah is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, peppers, palm oil, and other items for her business. Her plan is to build a house for her child.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, peppers, palm oil, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Mkambe

texts.en:
The goat meat business is an activity Mkambe has been involved in for several years. It is a business that is very profitable to her, which is why she has not thought of quitting it. In fact, the previous loan helped her to increase the number of goats she owns. 

Mkambe's aim is to see her business grow and to have a butcher shop, sometime. This new investment will enable Mkambe to buy five goats and expand her business. 

Mkambe is a visionary woman with many goals to reach and she is very determined to reach them.

loans.use: to buy five goats for her business.

loans.name: Derlis

texts.es:
El Sr Derlis tiene 38 años, está casado con la Sra. Myrian en la ciudad de Caacupé. El Sr  Derlis  se dedica a la fabricación y venta de zapatos de damas, caballero y niños. Es una persona muy trabajadora, y sus zapatos son muy requeridos por sus clientes, ya que vende en otras ciudades del país.
Solicita a la Fundación Paraguaya y Kiva un crédito para la compras de cueros materia prima principal para su producción, ya que llega la temporada donde tiene más pedidos y desea cumplir bien y   satisfacer a su clientela,  y obtener más ingreso a su unidad familiar
texts.en:
Derlis is 38 years old and married to Myrian. They live in the city of Caacupé. Derlis makes a living producing and selling men's, women's, and children's shoes. He is a hardworking man and his shoes are in high-demand, even in other cities. 

Derlis is requesting this loan from Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva in order to buy raw materials, such as leather, needed to produce his shoes. The season with the highest volume of orders is coming up and Derlis wishes to be ready to satisfy all of his customers' orders, so that he can obtain more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy leather for making shoes.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La señora Ana Maria es soltera; vivía con su pareja pero se separaron y tiene un hijo varón que esta en etapa escolar y otro que tambien vive con ella, vive en la casa de su mama la cual es una persona de la tercera edad donde cuenta con dos ambientes donde se encuentra el dormitorio y la sala, la habitación es de adobe con revoque de estuco y el piso de tierra y ladrillo, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri sur en la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja comercializando todo tipo de material de fontanería de material de pvc (tubos que se usan para alcantarillado, agua potable,codos, cajas, semicodos de pvc, etc.) en un puesto que se encuentra en una de las ferias ciudad de El Alto donde atiende los jueves y domingos, ella se encarga de los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios de su hogar.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería(más tubos de diferentes diámetros) y poder tener mercadería mas surtida y así mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Ana Maria es poder tener su propia tienda de material de construcción y así tener ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la tercera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Ana María is single.  She used to live with her partner but they separated; they have a son who is school age and another one that also lives with her.  She lives in her mother’s house.  Her mother is a senior citizen and the house has two environments where the bedroom and living room are located.  The room is stucco-covered adobe and the floor is dirt and brick.  The house is located in the Pasankeri zone in the southern part of the city of La Paz.

She currently works selling all types of plumbing supplies made of PVC (pipes that are used for drainage, potable water, elbows, boxes, semi-elbows made of PVC, etc.) in a stand located in one of El Alto's street markets; she’s open for business Thursdays and Sundays.  She’s responsible for household food and utility costs.  She needs the loan to buy merchandise (more tubing of various diameter) to have a better variety of merchandise in stock and thus improve her income.  Ana María’s dream is to have her own building supplies store to earn income and improve her quality of life.  This is her third loan request to IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy PVC for her hardware store.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
La señora Teofila, es soltera y tiene cuatro hijos los cuales ya son independientes, vive en alquiler  en una habitación pequeña con las paredes de adobe y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Teofila, trabaja elaborando y vendiendo empanadas al aceite en un puesto en la calle por más de ocho horas al día, ya que no cuenta con un puesto de venta fijo y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, alquiler y pago de servicios básicos .
El crédito lo requiere para comprar su material como ser harina, azúcar y aceite por mayor para tener más ingresos y elaborar más cantidad de empanadas al día.
El sueño de Teofila, es tener un lugar fijo para vender sus  empanada y ampliar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la tercera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Teófila’s single and has four children who are all independent now.  She rents a small room with adobe walls and dirt floor; the house is located in the city of La Paz.  Teófila works making and selling oil-fried turnovers in a street stand for more than 8 hours daily since she does not have a fixed sales point.  With the little she earns she must cover her food, rental and basic utility costs.  She needs the loan to buy supplies like flour, sugar and oil at wholesale to earn more income and make more turnovers per day.  Teófila’s dream is to have a fixed place in which to sell her turnovers and to expand her business in order to improve her income and quality of life.  This is the third time she’s worked with IMPRO and third with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and oil.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David, es soltero y  tiene un hijo que aún no  está en etapa escolar, viven en casa de sus padres, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Rio Seco de la ciudad de El Alto.

El estudió hasta el nivel secundario y actualmente se dedica a la venta de distintos artículos para el hogar como ser: bañadores, baldes, tazas, platos, juegos de te, frazadas y demás.

El crédito lo requiere para comprar tazas, bandejas, platos con diseños navideños ya que por las fiestas de fin de año es lo que mas demanda tiene por sus clientes.

El sueño de David es ser distribuidor de distintos artículos para el hogar, así se convertirá en un Gerente Propietario.

Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
David is single and has a child who is not yet school-aged.  They live in his parent's house, located in the Rio Seco neighborhood of the city of El Alto.

David has a high school education, and now has a business selling household goods such as: wash pails, buckets, cups, plates, tea sets, blankets, and other items.

David needs a loan to buy cups, trays, and plates with Christmas designs, because these item are in high demand by his customers during the end-of-year festivities.

David's dream is to become a wholesaler of household products.  This way, he could own and manage his own company. This is the second time that he has requested a loan from IMPRO, and the first time that he has worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy cups, trays, and plates with Christmas designs

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah, 32, is determined and hard working. She is a mother of two children, ages 10 and 12. They stay at home with their mother at Congo Town and are in school. For the past nine years Sarah has been selling oranges, plums, bananas, pineapples, and cucumbers adjacent to the supermarket. Her daily sales are high every day because she has many customers. She learned this trade from her mother and started in this business with the little amount that she saved with the saving club. She works 13 hours a day. She transports her goods to her business area by commercial vehicle. Sarah thanks the lenders for empowering her in her business. She has requested a loan to purchase more plantains, oranges, eddoes, and cucumbers for the business. Her plan for the future is to have a bigger store where she will sell different kinds of fruit.

loans.use: to purchase more plantains, oranges, eddoes, and cucumbers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add to his M-PESA business float.

loans.name: Zuhrohon

texts.ru: Зухрохон прекрасная портниха. Она выбрала это ремесло, потому что шитье женских  платьев приносит много дохода, так как имеет большой спрос. Каждая таджичка носить национальные платья и обновление платьев для каждого сезона, это работа и доход для портних. Зухрохон создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Ей 42 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4  детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и делает сбережения для будущих детей. Со всеми ежедневными расходами Зухрохон должна справляться сама. С целью получения дохода 3 года назад она начала свой бизнес. Она обслуживает клиентов дома.  Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Ее старшая дочь помогает ей в ведении бизнеса. Так как она использует свой доход для покупки продуктов питания и одежды для детей, она не может копить деньги и купить телевизор и холодильник для использования. Уже несколько лет у нее дома проблема из-за отсутствия холодильника. Она не может хранить продукты свежими, так как продукты быстро портятся. Ее дети просят ее купить холодильник и телевизор. С целью покупки телевизора и холодильника она запрашивает займ на сумму  3500 сомони. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zuhrohon is a wonderful seamstress.  She chose this trade because sewing women's clothes brings a good income because there is a strong demand for it.  Every Tajik woman wears traditional dresses and that they need repairing and remaking for each season means work and an income for seamstresses.  Zuhrohon makes masterpieces of traditional Tajik dresses.  She is 42 years old, married, and has four children.  Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation and is saving money for the children's future.  Zuhrohon has to deal with all the daily expenses herself.  To earn an income, she began her business three years ago.  She works from home.  Because of her good service, she has a large customer base.  Her eldest daughter helps her run the business. 

Since she uses her income to buy food and clothing for the children, Zuhrohon can't save money for a television and refrigerator.  For several years now, they have had problems without a refrigerator.  She can't keep food fresh, and it spoils quickly.  Her children are begging her to buy a television and refrigerator.  To buy them, she is requesting a loan of 3,500 somoni (TJS).  She is relying on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a TV set and refrigerator for her home

loans.name: Bubukarmat

texts.ru: Бубукарамат 46 лет, воспитывает 3 детей. Бубукарамат в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, полеводством и скотоводчеством, начав этот бизнес 18 лет  назад купив 1 бычка и 2 овец. Благодаря упорному труду Бубукарамат в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 4 коровы и 2 молодых теленка и 6 коз, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 11,000 сом (KGS). В ведении хозяйства Бубукарамат помагает муж и младший дети. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бубукарамат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров и овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Бубукарамат планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса, а в этом году хотела бы провести капитальный ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Bubukaramat is 46 years old and raising three children. 

As a main source of income for her family, Bubukaramat is involved in animal husbandry, agriculture, and raising livestock, starting this business 18 years ago with the purchase of one bull and two sheep. Through hard work, Bubukaramat today has in her household four cows, two young calves, and six goats. The monthly income from the farm is about 11,000 Som (KGS). Bubukaramat's husband and children help in managing the farm. 

In order to furhter develop her business, Bubukaramat appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 Som (KGS) to buy cows and sheep for fattening and resale. Bubukaramat plans to invest income from the loan in business development, and this year would like to carry out major repairs on her home.

loans.use: To purchase cows and sheep

loans.name: Haydar

texts.ru: Хайдар житель района Рудаки. Ему 42 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Жена Хайдара домохозяйка. Его сын находится в Российской Федерации. Сам Хайдар предоставляет услугу. Он занимается перевозками. В этой области Хайдар 7 лет. Он берет кредит для ремонта грузового автомобиля.
texts.en:
Haydar is a resident of the Rudaki region. He is 42 years old, married, and has four children. Haydar's wife is a homemaker. His son is living in the Russian Federation. 

Haydar provides a service on his own. He is engaged in transportation. Haydar has seven years experience in this area. He is taking a loan for truck repairs.

loans.use: to acquire spare parts

loans.name: Rogelia

texts.es:
La Sra Rogelia  tiene 39 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración de productos de limpieza, tiene una moto carro  en el cual realiza sus ventas en los diferentes barrios de la zona de Ñemby.
Es una persona con muchas ansias de salir adelante, está emprendiendo y quiere poder llegar a ser una gran microempresaria. Gracias a su pequeño negocio está teniendo mejores ingresos y ayudando a su familia. La Sra. cuenta con una gran clientela; con este trabajo logro mejorar su vivienda y ayudarle al marido con el ingreso.
El necesita de este crédito para la compra de materia prima para poder seguir haciendo sus productos, como aromatizantes, lavandina y demás.
texts.en:
Rogelia is thirty-nine and earns her living selling cleaning products.  She has a three-wheeler van for delivering products to the various neighborhoods in Ñemby.  

She is very anxious to get ahead.  She's on her way and wants to be a great micro-businesswoman.  Thanks to her small business, Rogelia is bringing in more income and helping out the family.  She has a large clientele, and through her work she'll manage to improve her house and help her husband with the income.  

Rogelia needs this loan to buy raw materials to keep making her products, like fragrances, bleach, and other items.

loans.use: to buy fragrances, bleach, and other items.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 47 years old and lives in the town of Iganga in the Iganga region of Uganda. He is married and has four children who are all currently in school. For the past five years, Stephen has been working hard to manage his retail shop, which sells sugar, salt, and cooking oil. 

To help expand his business, Stephen has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to stock up on essential commodities such as milk, cooking oil, sugar, and salt in order to attract more customers. Profits will increase and will help Stephen to pay school fees for his four children. Stephen hopes that in the future he will be able to expand his business into a wholesale shop. 

Stephen is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Stephen who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase essential commodities such as milk, cooking oil, sugar, and salt

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбубе 45 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж оказывает услугу такси местным жителям. Махбуба очень грамотная женщина. Благодаря родителям она получила высшее образование и более 10 лет работает в средней школе своего района учительницей начальных классов. Она любит свою профессию и работает с удовольствием, однако она получает маленькую зарплату, которая не хватает для содержания семьи. С целью обучения шитья и кройки она летом обучилась на курсе шитья и кройки и таким образом научилась шить национальные женские платья. Она планирует организовать свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды, так как оно имеет большой спрос. В ее районе мало портних и все женщины ездят в город, чтобы портнихи шили их платья. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет и надеется только на вас. Это займ поможет ей организовать бизнес и таким образом улучшить условию проживания.
texts.en:
Mahbuba is 45 years old. She is married and raising three children. Her husband has a taxi service for local residents. Mahbuba is a very competent woman. Thanks to her parents, she graduated and for more than ten years has been working at a school in her region as a primary school teacher. She loves her profession and does her work with pleasure, but she gets a small salary which is not enough to support a family. 

In order to learn sewing and cutting, over the summer she took a course and learned how to sew women's national dresses. She plans to organize her own business sewing women's clothing, because there is great demand. In her region, there are few dressmakers and all the women go to dressmakers in the city to sew their dresses. 

She is requesting a loan of 1,000 Somoni to buy a sewing machine. She is awaiting and hoping for your kindness. This loan will help her to organize the business and thus improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Sairabubu

texts.ru: Сайрабубу 61 год, замужем. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Сайрабубу занимается животноводством. Начатое в 1993 году с суммы 10,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство сегодня приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от откорма и перепродажи скота на местном рынке. Благодаря упорному труду Сайрабубу, ее поголовье насчитывает 2 бычка и 17 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сайрабубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для перепродажи, увеличив количество скотины она сможет увеличить доходы семьи. Доходы Сайрабубу планирует вложить в расширение бизнес - деятельности за увеличения поголовья скота. У них сейчас есть острая необходимость установки парового отопления.
texts.en:
Sairabubu is 61 years old.  She raises livestock as a source of income for her family.  The business she began in 1993 with 10,000 som (KGS) today brings in about 10,000 som (KGS) per month from the fattening and sale of livestock at the local market.  As a result of Sairabubu's hard work, her herd numbers two bulls and 17 sheep.

With an aim to further develop her business, Sairabubu applied to Bai Tushum & Parnters for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) for buying livestock for reselling.  By increasing the size of her herd, she will increase her family's income.  Sairabubu plans to invest the profits in expanding her business by increasing the size of her herd.  Right now, they have an acute need to install steam heating.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for fattening and later resale

loans.name: Virgen De Schoensttat Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama Virgen de Schoensttat  están en el Segundo  Ciclo   con 13  integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unidas solidarias  y responsable entre ellas. Están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas y se ayudan  las unas a las otras para salir adelante.
Karina es la presidenta del grupo, ella es una persona muy responsable, que siempre se ha esmerado por ayudar a su grupo y que también trabaja arduamente por ayudar a su familia. Karina se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comidas, con lo que está trabajando y de esa forma tiene los medios necesarios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar insumos para sus comidas, como ser condimentos, verduras, aderezos y demás, ya que de esta forma podrá seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The group is called Virgen de Schoensttat and they are in their second cycle, they have 13 members, it's a group that stands out in the neighborhood for being united in solidarity and responsible.  They are learning to work together and help each other to get ahead.

Karina is the president of the group, she is a very responsible person, she is always working hard to help the group and to help her family.  She makes and sells food, this is what she works on and through this she obtains the necessary funds to be able to help her family.

She requests the loan to buy ingredients for her food, such as condiments, vegetables, dressings and others, because this way she will be able to continue to work.

loans.use: to buy condiments, vegetables, dressings and other ingredients.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Emprendedoras,  se llama el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá, donde 17 mujeres decidieron unirse para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras y ayudar no solo a ellas sino también a sus hijos y sus familiares.
Luisa es parte de este grupo, se dedica a las ventas. Tiene una pequeña despensa bien surtida, con todo lo que su vecindario necesita. Es una persona que sabe como manejar su negocio y eta saliendo adelante gracias a su esfuerzo. Cuenta que también gracias a la ayuda de su grupo está saliendo adelante.
Solicita Luisa este crédito para  la compra de bebidas, gaseosas, panificados y demás, para poder seguir dando buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mujeres Emprendedoras is the name of the excellent group of women in the city of Itá, where 17 women decided to get together to be able to help not only each other but their children and family members as well.

Luisa is part of this group.  She makes a living in sales.  She has a small, well-stocked general store with everything her neighborhood needs.  She's a person who knows how to manage her business and she's getting ahead thanks to her effort--and, she says, thanks to the help of her group.

Luisa's requesting this loan to buy beverages, soda, baked goods, and other things to be able to continue giving her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to buy beverages, soda, baked goods, and other things

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
La Sra. Elena es de la ciudad de Pilar, tiene una granja con tamberia, comercializa leche de vaca y de cabra, también realiza ventas de queso y huevos de gallinas y patos, ventas de verduras y frutas en general. Está casada tiene 3 hijos, todos trabajan en el negocio familiar.
Es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, con más de 10 años de experiencia en esa zona. Gracias a su trabajo su familia está saliendo adelante y tienen todo lo que necesitan. Solicita el crédito para invertir en su negocio para la compra de chanchos, ya que quiere seguir creciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo, ya que le ayudará a crecer e ir mejorando.
texts.en:
Elena is from the city of Pilar and has a farm with a dairy farm.  She sells cow's milk and goat's milk as well as cheese, chicken eggs, duck eggs, and fruits and vegetables in general.  She's married and has three children, all of whom work in the family business.

She's a very hardworking and responsible person with more than 10 years of experience in this area.  Thanks to her job her family is getting ahead and they have everything they need.

She's requesting the loan to invest in her business by buying pigs so she can continue to grow.  She's grateful for this opportunity because it will help her grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Córdula

texts.es:
Córdula es una señora de 57 años, ella se considera una persona positiva, triunfadora, responsable y muy trabajadora. Córdula vive con su hijo en el cantón de Pimampiro. Córdula trabaja en la venta de papas fritas y hamburguesas negocio que le ayuda a sustentar algunos gastos de su hogar. 

El crédito que solicita a Fodemi es para la compra de los ingredientes para la realización de papas fritas y las hamburguesas y también en la compra de una cocina industrial más grande para la realización de la comida rápida, esta inversión es debido a que Córdula está teniendo  mucha demanda en el mercado y mucho más en lod dias de feria que se realizan tres veces por semana. Esta inversión  ayudará a Córdula a generar un incremento en sus ingresos y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de los suyos. 

Doña  Córdula sueña en tener más un local más grande y lujoso donde pueda vender sus papas y hamburguesas y con estos ingresos ayudar a sus nietos a quien tanto ama y cuida.
texts.en:
Córdula is a fifty-seven-year-old woman who considers herself to be a winning, positive, responsible, and very hardworking person.  She lives with her son in the Pimampiro canton.  She sells burgers and fries, a business that helps covers some of her household expenses. 

The loan Córdula is seeking is to buy ingredients for making burgers and fries and also to purchase a bigger industrial kitchen for making fast food.  She needs to make the investment because she is seeing a lot of demand in the market, and even more at the market fairs she sells at three days a week.  The investment will help her generate more income so she'll be able to improve her family's quality of life.  

Córdula's dream is to have a larger and fancier locale where she can sell her burgers and fries and use the income to help her grandchildren, whom she loves and cares for so much.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making hamburgers and french fries, and to invest in the purchase of a large industrial kitchen for making fast food.

loans.name: Clemantine

texts.en:
Clemantine is 40 years old. She has sold beans and sorghum for the past four years. She is married to a farmer and they have five children. 

With the loan, Clemantine wants to buy more beans and sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph used his previous loan to expand his business by purchasing more stock.  His current monthly income from the business is. 60,000 KES.  He is requesting a loan for 80,000 KES, which he will use to add more stock of shoes and clothes to his business to sell in the coming high season.

loans.use: to purchase more shoes (both new and second-hand shoes).

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Eugenie

texts.en:
Eugenie is 32 years old. She is married to a businessman. She owns a store which she has been running for three years. 

Eugenie wants the loan to buy more rice, sugar, and salt for sale. The profits from the business will be used to refurbish her house.

loans.use: To buy more rice, sugar, and salt for sale.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 25 years old and a resident of Sana`a, Yemen. He manages his household while operating his business. He is working hard to continually provide income for his family's everyday expenses. Ali operates a pharmacy selling medicines to clients. 

Ali is requesting a youth loan from AMB for 350,000 YER, which he will use to buy medicines for his business. He hopes to expand his business in the coming years.

loans.use: to purchase medicines for his business.

loans.name: Mirembe

texts.en:
Mirembe is 26 years old and lives in the town of Iganga in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is single and has three children, two of them currently in school. For the past three years, Mirembe has been working hard to manage her small business, which sells clothes. 

To help expand her business, Mirembe has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes that will be sold, and will help Mirembe to generate greater profits, boost the business and pay school fees for her children. Mirembe hopes that in the future she will be able to stock more clothes to be sold in the festive season. 

Mirembe is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Mirembe who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 30 years old, married, and has three children who attend school. She sells different items in her boutique. 

Florence is requesting a loan, which she will use buy more tea bags, cooking oil, and lotions to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase tea bags, cooking oil, and lotions.

loans.name: Gaudence

texts.en:
Gaudence is 38 years old. She sells vegetables and has been in the business for the past five years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy carrots, eggplants and cabbages for sale. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more carrots, eggplants and cabbages for sale.

loans.name: Boginiso

texts.ru: Богинисо 48 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Сыну 23 года, а дочке 18 лет. Богинисо более 6 лет занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она шьет платья дома и имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Она сама справляется с бизнесом. Ее муж получает маленькую зарплату и поэтому Богинисо является основным кормильцем в семье. Ее сын в этом году планирует женится на любимой девушке. Богинисо не имеет сбережения для проведения свадьбы сына. Процесс проведения свадьбы требует массу денег, а Богинисо не может отказаться сыну. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4500 сомони для проведения свадьбы сына. Она ждет и надеется только вас, так как больше никто не в состоянии поддержать ее. Это займ поможет ей сделать счастливым сына.
texts.en:
Boginiso is 48 years old. She is married and has two adult children. Her son is 23 years old and her daughter is 18. 

Boginiso has more than six years experience in sewing women's clothing. She sews dresses at her home and has regular customers. She deals with the business on her own. Her husband receives a small salary and thus Boginiso is the main breadwinner in the family. 

Her son plans to marry his girlfriend this year. Boginiso has no savings to put on her son's wedding. The process of putting on a wedding requires a lot of money, but Boginiso cannot refuse her son. She is requesting a loan of 4,500 Somoni to put on a wedding for her son. This loan will help her to make her son happy.

loans.use: to make a wedding party

loans.name: Murodjon

texts.ru: Муродчон житель Спитаменского района. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Муродчон занимается животноводством. Этот вид деятельности для него является семейным. Муродчон разводит мелко - рогатый скот у себя дома. У него имеются необходимые условия для разведения мелко - рогатого скота. Муродчон берет кредит для закупа несколько голов овец и коз с целью расширения свей деятельности.
texts.en: Murodjon lives in the Spitamen region.  He's thirty-five, married, and has two children.  He raises livestock at his house, the family business, and he's in need of some essentials.  He'll use his loan to buy a few heads of sheep and goats so he can expand his business.

loans.use: to buy heads of sheep and goats.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 32 years old and lives in the town of Iganga in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is married and has four children, three of them currently in school. For the past three years, Jennifer has been working hard to manage her retail shop, in which she sells sugar, salt, and cooking oil. 

To help expand her business, Jennifer has requested a loan of 2000000 UGX (Ugandan Shillings) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to increase more essential commodities such as milk, cooking oil, sugar, and salt, in order to attract more customers. Also, it will help Jennifer to generate greater profits, improve her business, and improve her family's standard of living. Jennifer hopes that, in the future, she will be able to manage paying for her children's education, up to the university level. 

Jennifer is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs, like Jennifer, who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to increase more essential commodities such as milk, cooking oil, sugar, and salt, in order to attract more customers.

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en:
Esperance, aged 26, is married with three children. She has been selling different items in her store, which she has been running for five years. 

With the loan requested, she will buy more items such as salt, cooking oil, soaps and rice for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy a motorbike to use in transportation, as well as the source of earning for her.

loans.use: to buy more new items such as salt, cooking oil, soaps and rice for sale.

loans.name: Luvuno

texts.en:
Luvuno is a 40-year-old woman living with her husband and their seven children. She is a woman with a desire to succeed. She has always been known for being a hard worker and everything has been inspired by her family. 

For the past seven years, Luvuno has been selling goats at the market. She sells to people who buy for slaughter. Her aim is to own a butcher shop in the future. With the loan, she will buy more goats for resale.

loans.use: to buy more goats for resale.

loans.name: Nyamvula

texts.en: Nyamvula is 46 years old and lives with her family in the town of Tiribe. She is well known as a woman who is very dedicated to her family, is honest, and whose dream is to continue providing the best for her family. She wants to ensure that they always have their daily bread. With great effort she has managed a food stall that has been active for the last three years. She prepares African dishes. She needs to have ingredients on hand, which is why she is asking for this loan to buy wheat flour, beans, rice, sugar, cooking oil, etc. She plans to expand her stall so that she can have a spacious place to sell.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, beans, rice, sugar, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Bahodurkhon

texts.ru: Баходурхону 29 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 1 дочь. Его дочке 2 года. Баходурхон старается, чтобы его дочь выросла в достатке, чтобы у нее было воспоминание о детстве, как «счастливое детство». Несколько лет назад он был трудовым мигрантом в Российской Федерации. Когда он вернулся на родину он начал свой бизнес, купле продажей сухофруктов. Уже 1,5 года как он занимается этим бизнесом. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек и поэтому ему удалось за 1,5 года развивать бизнес и получить доход. От полученного дохода он сделал капитальный ремонт дома и купил машину марки «Мерседес». У него много планов будущим и он хочет реализовать все мечты на реальность. Для этого он нуждается больше доходу, для чего должен развевать бизнес дальше. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки сухофруктов для пополнения оборотного капитала. Он ждет и надеется на вашу благотворительность. Это займ будет играть большую роль в его жизни.
texts.en:
Bahodurkhon is 29 years old. He is married and is raising one daughter. His daughter is two years old. Bahodurkhon is trying to have his daughter grow up in abundance, so that she wil have memories of her childhood as a "happy childhood." 

A few years ago, he was a migrant laborer in the Russian Federation. When he returned home, he began his own business buying and selling dried fruit. He has been in business already for a year and a half. He is a very hardworking and goal-oriented person, and therefore he managed in 1.5 years to develop his business and receive an income. From the revenue, he made a major renovation to his home and bought a Mercedes car. 

He has many plans for the future, and he wants to realize all of his dreams in reality. For this, he needs more income, which should develop the business even further. He is requesting a loan of $1,000 to buy dried fruit to replenish his working capital. This loan will play a big role in his life.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits to increase assets

loans.name: Zukhra

texts.ru: Зухра живет в Пянджском районе. Ей 28 лет. Она замужем, имеет 1 ребенка. Ее муж работает в Российской Федерации. Зухра занимается животноводством. Она хочет брать кредит для покупки скота.
texts.en: Zukhra lives in Pyanj.  She's twenty-eight, married, and has one little girl.  Her husband works in the Russian Federation.  Zukhra makes her living raising livestock and is seeking a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Doña luz originaria de Granada, con 44 años de edad, madre de 4 hijos, casada, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la elaboración de pan y repostería. Ella dice que su  primer  crédito, lo utilizo  para comprar sartenes para hacer moldes  de pudines y  también poder comprar toda la materia prima que necesita para la elaboración de su pan, de esta manera poder satisfacer a sus cliente, vendiéndoles sus pan en mayor cantidad y a un buen precio. 
Ella solicita su segundo préstamo  para comprar, levadura, manteca, harina, azúcar etc, para invertirlo en su negocio, ya que se acerca la época navideña en donde la demanda de sus  ventas crecen , sus planes futuros es pagar este crédito para luego volver a solicitar otro, su meta próxima es ampliar el local en donde tiene su negocio y hacerle mejoras.
.
texts.en:
Luz, 44, is from Granada.  She's married and the mother of four children.  A merchant by trade, she earns a living making bread and pastry.  She says she used her first loan to buy pans for pudding molds and all the raw materials she needs to make her bread to satisfy her customers, selling them larger quantities of bread at a good price.

She's requesting her second loan to buy leavening, lard, flour, sugar, etc., to invest in her business because the Christmas season is coming and her sales demand increases.

Her plan for the future is to repay this loan and then request another one.  Her next goal is to expand and make improvements to the space where she has her business.

loans.use: to buy leavening, lard, flour, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El comité “Maria Auxiliadora” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad de Santaní. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y gracias a eso ya están en su noveno ciclo.
La Sra. Teresa se dedica a la ventas de carne de chancho, verduras, gallina casera y demás. Es una persona que se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante y se nota ya que hace de todo para poder ir creciendo y ayudando a su familia. Quiere seguir invirtiendo en su trabajo y es por eso que solicita de este crédito, ya que quiere comprar verduras y así abastecerse un poco más.
Ella está muy agradecida, ya que su grupo ha sido un buen sostén para ella y está saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
The committee “Maria Auxiliadora” was formed when various neighbors from the community of Santani came together. The members formed a very united group and because of this they are already in their ninth cycle. 

Mrs. Teresa makes a living from the sale of pork, vegetables, home-raised chicken and other things. She is the type of person who always strives to get ahead which shows as she does everything in her power to continue growing and helping her family. She would like to continue investing in her job and because of this she is requesting the loan, as she would like to buy vegetables and in that way have more stock. 

She is very thankful because her group has offered her good support and she is moving forward.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Reina De La Paz Group

texts.es:
El grupo Reina de la paz se encuentra en el 5º  ciclo, con mucho sacrificio y con el arduo esfuerzo de todas están creciendo, ya que son mujeres de escasos recursos que quieren salir adelante para ayudar a sus familias.
La señora Fátima es una señora muy humilde que se dedica a la venta de Harina de Maíz junto con sus hijos, son muy emprendedores  y quieren salir adelante. Fátima nos dice que todo está muy difícil, pero que ella se esfuerza mucho y que no se da por vencida, ya que lucha por sus hijos.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra maíz, el cual procesara y hará la harina que vende. Agradece por esta ayuda, ya que no solo ella, sino todas las familias de las miembros se ven beneficiadas con esto.
texts.en:
The "Reina de la paz" (Queen of Peace) group is in its 5th loan cycle and with the sacrifice and hard work of everyone, they're moving forward. These are women of few financial resources who want to get ahead to help their families.
Fátima is a very humble woman who sells corn flour with her children. They are very determined and want to get ahead. Fátima tells us that everything is difficult but she works hard and won't let herself be defeated because she's in this fight for her children.
She is requesting a loan to buy corn that she will process to make corn flour and then sell it. She is grateful for the help as it benefits all of the members' families, not just hers.

loans.use: buy corn to make corn flour.

loans.name: Maliki

texts.en:
Maliki is 27 years old and lives in the town of Namutumba in the Iganga region of Uganda. He is married and has two children. For the past ten years, Maliki has been working hard to manage his retail shop, which sells sugar, salt and cooking oil. 

To help expand his business, Maliki has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to increase plastic items such as plates and cups, and will help Maliki to generate greater profits and pay for his family’s medical bills. 

Maliki hopes that in the future he will be able to start up another retail shop for his wife. 

Maliki is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Maliki who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to increase plastic items such as plates and cups.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy baby goats that she will raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан имеет огромное сердце и добрую душу. Он человек с большой буквой и поэтому обладает уважением многих людей. Ему 45 лет. Он женат и имеет 3 детей. Хасан старается, чтобы его семья жила в достатке и с такой целью он начал свой бизнес 19 лет назад изготовлением и реализации окон и дверей. Он мастер с «золотыми руками» и изготавливает качественные и красивые окна и двери по современным дизайнам. Благодаря хорошему сервису он обладает широким кругом клиентов. Хасан сам справляется с бизнесом, так как никто из членов семьи не помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Его продукция продается в основном на севере Таджикистана, и качества работы никогда не подвела его. Так как последнее время больше спроса его продукциям, он хочет развивать бизнес, то есть изготавливать больше окон и дверей. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки доски. Он является повторным клиентом и имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Он обещает погасить займ во время. Он ждет и надеется на вашу доброту. Это займ поможет ему получить больше дохода и улучшить условию проживания и таким образом принести покой и радость в своей семье.
texts.en:
Hasan has a huge heart and a good soul. He is a "person with a capital P" and therefore has the respect of many people. He is 45 years old. He is married and has three children. Hasan is trying to keep his family living with abundance, and with this goal he began his own business 19 years ago manufacturing and selling windows and doors. 

He is a master woordworker with "golden hands" and manufactures high quality and beautiful windows and doors in a modern design style. Thanks to excellent service, he has a wide range of customers. Hasan copes the business on his own, as none of the family members helps him in the business. His products are sold mainly in the north of Tajikistan, and the quality of the work never disappoints. 

Since the last time, there is more demand for his products. He wants to develop the business, that is to manufacture more windows and doors. He is requesting a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy wood. 

He is a repeat customer and has a good credit history. He promises to repay his loan on time. This loan will help him to get more income and to improve living conditions and thus bring peace and joy to his family.

loans.use: To buy wood for making doors and windows

loans.name: Kuña Arandu Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Kuña Arandu, se conformó en el año 2009, con mucho esfuerzo y esmero ya en el 9º ciclo, en donde cada una se esmera por salir adelante y lo muestra trabajando duro y también ayudando a las demás.
Carolina una de las miembros, se dedica a la confección de prendas, es una muy buena trabajadora, hace todo tipo de ropas, las cuales son de muy buena calidad y son muy gustadas por sus clientes. Hoy en día ya tiene mucha clientela y siempre está con mucho trabajo, lo cual agradece, ya que así puede ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, gomas y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus prendas y cumplir con pedidos que tiene.
En la foto del grupo aparece una persona más, ya que el grupo tiene 13 miembros, pero esta vez retiran el crédito solo 12 de ellas.
texts.en:
The group of women named Kuña Arandu was formed in the year 2009 with great effort and care and they are now in their ninth cycle. Each woman strives to get ahead, which she shows by working hard and helping the others. 

Carolina, one of the members, makes a living from sewing clothing. She is a very hard worker and makes all types of clothing, which are of high quality and well liked by her customers. These days she has a lot of customers and is always very busy, which she is thankful for because she can help out her family. 

She is requesting this loan in order to invest it by purchasing fabric, thread, glue and other supplies in order to continue sewing clothing and fulfilling her customer's orders. 

There is an extra person in the photo as the group has 13 members, but this time the loan is only for 12 of them.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, glue and other supplies.

loans.name: Kingmah

texts.en:
Kingmah is 32 years old. She is a single mother with four children. Only two of the children are attending school. 

Kingmah stopped her education in the 5th grade. For the past five years, she has been selling soft drinks and alcoholic drinks (e.g., beer, stout, gin) in the community where she has a booth. She sells fourteen hour per day, transporting her goods by taxi. She is proud of her business because she makes a profit. With the profit, she buys more goods and attends to the needs of her children. 

Kingmah has requested this loan to purchase more soft drinks and alcoholic drinks for the business. She hopes to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks and alcoholic drinks (e.g., beer, stout, gin) for the business.

loans.name: Yamah

texts.en:
Yamah, 42, stopped her education in the ninth grade. She lives with her husband in the Congo Town community.  Her husband is a contractor. Yamah is a hardworking mother with two children, ages 9 and 16, who are currently in school.

Yamah has a table at the market where she sells artificial hair. She sells from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. She learned this type of trade from her friends. She received the initial capital from her husband to start in this business.

She is grateful to the lenders for their support in her business. She makes a profit when she sells because she sells different types of artificial hair, weaves, caps, short weaves, and long weaves, and they are all 100% human hair. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more artificial hair for her business. Her plan for the future is to extend the business into a store.

loans.use: to purchase more artificial hair for her business.

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru: Динаре 44 лет, замужем, имеет 1 сына. Заемщик имеет высшее образование. Сельским хозяйством занимается с детства, помагала родителям по хозяйству и приобрела большой опыт в этом деле. Человек показал себя как очень ответственного и трудолюбивого человека.  С 1995 года Динара занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 11,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время в хозяйстве Динары имеется 1 дойная корова и 2 овец, ежемесячная прибыль составляет примерно 4,000 сом (KGS) от откорма скота.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Динара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на приобретение 2 голов бычков. Доходы от кредита Динара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Dinara is 44 years old, married, and has one son. This borrower has a higher education, She has been occupied with agriculture since childhood, when she helped her parents on the farm and acquired a lot of experience in this work. She proved to be a very responsible and hardworking person. 

Since 1995, Dinara has been engaged in raising livestock, starting this business with the sum of 11,000 Som (KGS). Currently, Dinara has in her farm one dairy cow and two sheep. The monthly income is approximately 4,000 сом (KGS) from the fattening of livestock. In order to further develop her business, Dinara appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 45,000 Som (KGS) for the purchase of two heads of cattle. Dinara plans to invest income from the loan in further expanding her farm.

loans.use: To purchase two bulls

loans.name: Abdunabi

texts.ru:
Абдунаби 30 - летний мужчина проживающий в Спитаменском районе. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Абдунаби занимается животноводством у себя дома. В этом ему помогает его жена. Он в основном закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом бизнеса Абдунаби занимается девять лет. 
Абдунаби берет кредит для закупа бычков в дальнейшем для продажи.
texts.en:
Abdunabi is a 30-year-old man living in the Spitamen region. He is married and has one infant. 

Abdunabi is engaged in raising livestock at his home. His wife helps him in this work. He basically buys livestock for resale in the future. Abdunabi has been involved in this kind of work for nine years. 

Abdunabi is taking a loan to buy bulls for future resale.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Shafoatjon

texts.ru: Шафоатчон жительница города Худжанд. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Шафоатчон занимается торговлей. Она арендует торговую точку на рынке. Шафоатчон занимается продажей женской одежды, косметики и парфюмерии. Торговлей она занимается десять лет. Шафоатчон берет кредит для покупки женских аксессуаров и косметики.
texts.en:
Shafoatjon is a resident of the city of Khujand. She is Ей 38 years old, married, and has two children. 

Shafoatjon engages in trade. She rents a kiosk in the market. Shafoatjon is engaged in the sale of women's clothing, cosmetics and perfumes. She has been a trader for ten years. 

Shafoatjon is taking a loan to buy women's accessories and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy women's accessories and cosmetics

loans.name: El Tule Sur Group

texts.es: El banco comunal el Tule Sur está conformado por 8 integrantes, madres soltera, con 20 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Esta integrantes son originarias del Sauce lugar que está ubicado en la zona de norte del país. Las integrantes del Tule Sur son mujeres responsables, trabajadoras de buenas costumbres con ganas de superación personal. Son mujeres que han sido muy trabajadas, luchadoras para poder casar adelantes a sus hijos. Ellas decidieron unirse para benefiarse del desembolso e invertir en sus diferentes negocios en los cuales se apoyan mutuamente. Olga Lidia es la coordinadora del banco la cual se encarga de la responsabilidad las cuotas de pago en tiempo y forma. Ella tiene por actividad económica la venta de leche y cuajada que es una las mayores actividades de la zona.  Este trabajo lo realiza de forma ambulante con una pana en su cabeza de unos 20 kg ofreciendo sus productos, a los vecinos de su localidad. Y también vende en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y comprar  más leche y cuajada para la venta. El banco comunal El Tule Sur agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en: The El Tule Sur communal bank comprises 8 members, all single mothers responsible for 20 children. These members are originally from Sauce, an area that's in the north of the country. The members of El Tule Sur are responsible, hard-working women with a good work ethic and a desire to get ahead. These women have been hard workers and fighters in order to get their children ahead. They decided to form this group to benefit from the capital and mutually support each other's businesses by investing in them. Olga Lidia is the coordinator of the bank and in charge of making the payments on time. She sells milk and curds, which is one of the major activities of the area. She sells it on foot with a plank on her head that weighs approximately 20 Kg, offering her products to her neighbors in her neighborhood. She also sells from home. The objective of the loan is to invest in business capital and buy more milk and curds to sell. The communal bank El Tule Sur is grateful for the help that Kiva investors give to people of few resources, and poor countries such as Nicaragua, giving people a chance to have dignified work.

loans.use: invest in business capital and buy more milk and curds to sell.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hanna, 33, lives in the Congo Town community. She is married and the mother of three children between the ages of 2 and 11. They all live at home and are in school. 

Hanna is hard-working and has been managing her business for the past fourteen years. She sells palm oil, rice, onions, Vita (juice drink), salt, cooking oil and many other items. Hannah sells from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. daily. 

Hanna started in this business with the amount of $3,500 that she received from the savings club. She makes a profit when she sells, and she uses some of the profit to buy more goods and help her husband with the expenses of the family. She transports her goods by taxi to her business area. 

She has requested a loan to purchase more palm oil, rice, pepper, Vita and onions for the business. Hannah has thanked the lenders for their support in her business. Her dream is to build a decent house for the future.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice, pepper, Vita and onions for her business.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 32 years old, married, and has three children who attend school.  She lives in Congo Town and has been working hard at her business for seven years. Sarah sells six day a week from 7 AM to 5 PM.  She sells lappers (country cloth), women's handbags, and head ties. She learned to sell from her mother 

Sarah started her business with money received from her husband. Because of the quality material that she sells, she make a profit every day and uses some of the profit to buy more goods and help with the expenses of the family. 

Sarah is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase lappers (country cloth), hand bags, and head ties for her business. Her plan for the future is to become a big businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase lappers (country cloth), hand bags, and head ties.

loans.name: Mujeres De Honor Group

texts.en:
The “Mujeres de Honor” trust bank is located in Patzun, Chimaltenango, Guatemala. The six women of this trust bank are involved in various businesses such as the sale of clothes, perfumes and poultry. Another member operates a bakery. As is the custom in several countries around the world, including Guatemala, many micro entrepreneurs take advantage of the holiday season at the end of the year to earn more for their business. Such is the case of Rebecca, a 38-year-old married woman who is a tailor.

She is the mother of three children, who currently attend kindergarten and 5th grade. Both Rebecca and her husband are business partners, and they work together. Neither of them completed primary school. They work hard to support their children’s education so that they can excel and perhaps attend college one day. 

As the year-end holidays have arrived as well as the anticipated beginning of the new school year, Rebecca is quite busy. As there will be an increased demand for school uniforms, Rebecca has applied for a loan with Friendship Bridge so she can buy various kinds of fabrics and other materials necessary to sew clothing.

This is Rebecca's 4th loan cycle with Friendship Bridge. She states that she really likes the organization because it not only supports her financially with capital but also because of the monthly training she receives on various subjects such as, women's health, children's rights, business management, among others. She believes that all these topics enrich women’s lives and help them to understand how to live a better life.

Rebecca appreciates the support that her business is receiving through the KIVA investors. She wishes a Merry Christmas to all and a very happy and
blessed 2013.

loans.use: To buy fabrics.

loans.name: Rocio Del Amanecer Group

texts.en:
The “Rocio del Amanecer” trust bank, consists of seven well-organized women. They feel blessed from the moment they open their eyes at dawn each day because they realize that new opportunities await!

Astrid is one of the members of this trust bank. She is a 21 year old single mother of twin girls. She is determined to set a good example for her daughters and struggles to move ahead. She is studying tourism and has just completed her second year in college.

Furthermore, Astrid is the successful manager of an ice cream shop which has become her primary business. She has applied for a loan from Friendship Bridge which she will use to remodel her business in order to attract more customers. She envisions an attractive shop with a pleasant atmosphere. She has already secured some estimates for the work that needs to be done. Astrid is anxious to draw families into her business, especially for the holiday season. She is confident that her business will continue to generate profits, as it is doing now, so she can continue her studies and support her family. She is very excited as her girls will start school in January.

Astrid and the other 6 women from the group are thrilled to get new loans from Friendship Bridge. These loans will serve as working capital for various businesses such as the sale of fast food, the sale of poultry and the sale of products by catalog. A bright future lies ahead for Astrid and the women of “Rocio de Amanecer”!

loans.use: remodel her business

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en: This is 46 year-old Mohamed.  He is married, and has four children, aged 20, 17, 13 and 10. He has one additional dependent, who lives with him because of schooling.  In 1993, Mohamed established his tailoring business. He began his business just to enable him to settle his domestic problem. His business is located at the center of town and his main customers are both men and women. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 350,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Mohamed has already received and successfully repaid two loans and now requires a new loan in order to buy tailoring supplies. He hopes that this loan will help increase his output. In the future, Mohamed plans to establish a modern tailoring shop and to develop his plot of land. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy tailoring materials.

loans.name: Kodirjon

texts.ru: Кодирджон живет в Пянджском районе. Ему 54 года. Он женат, имеет 4 детей. Его дети работают в Российской Федерации. Кодирчон уже 5 лет занимается животноводством. Он хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота и берет кредит для покупки крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Kodirjon lives in the Pyandj region. He is 54 years old, married, and has four children. His children are working in the Russian Federation. 

Kodirjon has been engaged in raising livestock for five years already. He wants to expand the number of his cattle and is taking a loan to buy livestock.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра жительница города Худжанд. Ей 33 года. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Гулчехра портниха. Он предоставляет услугу у себя дома. Гулчехра шьет мужскую и женскую одежду. Также она шьет национальную одежду. Гулчехра берет кредит для приобретения модернизированной швейной машинки для вышивки.
texts.en:
Gulchehra is a resident of the city of Khujand. She is 33 years old, married, and has an infant. Her husband is working in the Russian Federation. 

Gulchehra is a dressmaker. She offers services from her home. Gulchehra sews men's and women's clothing. She also sews national clothing. Gulchehra is taking a loan to buy a modernized sewing machine for embroidery.

loans.use: to purchase an upgraded sewing machine for embroidery

loans.name: Mujeres Benditas. Group

texts.en:
“Mujeres Benditas” was established five years ago and has gradually expanded. With the holiday season just around the corner, the twelve hardworking women of the trust bank are quite busy with last minute preparations. They are anxious to maximize their efforts to raise funds. It is a priority to save as much as they can so that they are able to send their children to school in January!

Ingrid Yolanda, a 25 year old woman, has followed her mother into Friendship Bridge. Her hard working and dedicated mother has set a great example for her daughter. She has achieved many of her goals and Ingrid has witnessed this! She is motivated by her children who give her inspiration and strength and she states that they are her primary focus. Ingrid and her husband live in the rural community of Xepatan, Patzun, and Chimaltenango, Guatemala. They have worked in agriculture for several years. However, last year she decided to make a change in her business life and opened a small storefront. By doing this, she could realize a faster turnaround in her financial capital. Ingrid is very pleased and inspired with the result that this loan has brought to her life.

Ingrid shares that her business is doing well. For the holiday season, she has decided to include the sale of fireworks as well as seasonal produce like grapes, apples, and pears. For this reason, Ingrid sought her first loan with Friendship Bridge. It will be invested to increase her shop inventory, and to buy the seasonal product, mentioned above. With her business profit, she will be able to send her oldest daughter to school in January!  Ingrid is a woman with great desire to excel, not only for herself but for her family as well. 

“Mujeres Benditas” acknowledges the support and trust of the many KIVA supporters and investors around the world. They are most appreciative the opportunity to secure a loan which not only benefits them but their family and community as well

loans.use: INCREASE INVENTORY IN HER STORE

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This is a 30-year-old businesswoman.  She is single and has no children. In the year 2006, she established her local foodstuffs business. Working six days a week and eight hours a day, she earns about Le 700,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 6,000,000. 

She has already received and successfully repaid two loans, and she now requires a new loan in order to buy more local foodstuffs for her business such as palm oil, gari (cassava grits), foo-foo (processed cassava), bennie (sesame seeds) and groundnuts.. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000. In the future, she plans to rent her own store where other traders from the provincial town will buy in large quantity to sell to the villagers. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more local foodstuffs for her inventory.

loans.name: Hawanatu

texts.en: This is 42-year-old Hawanatu.  She is married and has three children, aged 3, 12 and 17 years. In 1990, Hawanatu established her slippers and clothing business. She inherited this business from her aunt who brought her up because she never went to school. "This business is my only means of livelihood", said Hawanatu. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 5,000,000.  Hawanatu requires a loan in order to buy different kinds of clothing and slippers for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Hawanatu plans to educate her children to the university level and build a house for her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more plastic slippers and clothing for her business

loans.name: Rashidatu

texts.en:
Rashidatu is 34 years old, single, and has one child. In 2002, Rashidatu established her drinks and provisions business. Having lost her dad just after she graduated from high school and with her mother having no source of income to help her pursue further studies, Rashidatu was left with no option but to go into business. Working seven days a week and nine hours a day, she earns about 1,500,000 SLL a month.

Rashidatu is requesting a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL, which she will use to buy 10 crates of stout, 20 crates of beer, 20 crates of maltina, and 30 bottles of mayonnaise. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 900,000 SLL. In the future, Rashidatu plans to expand her business and hopes to see her son educated to university level.

loans.use: To buy 10 crates of stout, 20 crates of beer, 20 crates of maltina,  and 30 bottles of mayonnaise. .

loans.name: Moorkan

texts.ru: Мооркан 54 лет, замужем. У нее с мужем 3 взрослых детей. Мооркан с 1994 года занимается торговлей продуктами питания в особенности кондитерскими изделиями, начав этот бизнес с 2,000 сом (KGS). По бизнесу активно помогает муж и сын Мооркан который живет в месте с ними. Благодаря упорному труду Мооркан и её семьи,магазин имеет очень много постоянных клиентов.  Продажа  продуктов питания приносит около 10,000 (KGS)сом в месяц.  По мимо этого она занимается животноводством в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы и 14 голов мелко рогатого скота, также имеется 2 га земли где ежегодно сеет пшеницу и многолетнюю траву. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мооркан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на увеличения товарооборота, кондитерских изделий в магазине. Доходы от кредита Мооркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ассортимента кондитерских изделий в магазине.
texts.en:
Moorkan is 54 years old and married. She and her husband have three grown children. Since 1994, Moorkan has been engaged in the trade of food products especially confections, starting this business with 2,000 Som (KGS). Moorkan is actively helped in the business by her husband and son, who lives with them. Through the hard work of Moorkan and her family, the store has a lot of regular customers. Food salas bring in about 10,000 Som (KGS) per month.  

In the past, she has been engaged in raising livestock and her farm today has three cows and 14 heads of small livestock (sheep and goats). She also has two hectares of land where every year she sows wheat and perennial grasses. 

With the goal of further developing her business, Moorkan appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 Som (KGS) to expand the inventory of confectionary products in her store. Moorkan plans to invest income from the loan in further expanding her assortment of confectionary products in the store.

loans.use: To increase the turnover of pastry sales

loans.name: Karachach

texts.ru: Карачач 52 года, замужем, имеет девять детей, 4 сыновей и 5 дочерей. Муж и дети помогают её по хозяйству. Карачач выросла в семье фермеров, ее родители издавна занимались животноводством. Имея большой опыт в ведении хозяйства, 16 лет назад семья Карачач начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством.  В настоящее время в хозяйстве Карачач имеется  20 голов овец и 16 индеек и кур, приносящие доход от сдачи молока производителям молочной продукции в сумме около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях расширения бизнеса, Карачач обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы. В планах у семьи улучшить материальное положение семьи.
texts.en:
Karachach is 52 years old, married, and has nine children, four sons and five daughters. Her husband and children help her on the farm. Karachach grew up in a family of farmers. Her parents have long been engaged in raising livestock. Having a lot of experience in running a farm, Karachach's family 16 years ago began to engage in raising livestock and agriculture. Today, Karachach has on her farm 20 heads of sheep and 16 turkeys and chickens. Income from the manufacture of dairy products is about 10,000 Som (KGS). 

With the aim of expanding her business, Karachach appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 Som (KGS) to buy dairy cows. В планах у семьи улучшить материальное положение семьи.

loans.use: To purchase cows

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 27 años, es una mujer joven, amable y muy trabajadora, es madre de un niño quien tiene 7 años, convive con Julio de 28 años quien es el padre de su hijo, ella a lado de su familia vive en una casa propia construida con apoyo económico de sus familiares en donde comparte con su pareja la alegría de vivir juntos y su continuo esfuerzo por tener una mejor calidad de vida. María se dedica a la venta de zapatos y sandalias, de manera quincenal o mensual, dependiendo de la demanda de sus productos. Para obtener su mercadería viaja a otra ciudad  en autobús por mas de 20 horas, desde ahí realiza el mismo viaje de retorno trayendo gran cantidad de artículos para venderlos entre sus familiares, amigos y demás personas, los diseños que trae son modelos de temporada, exclusivos y de alta calidad, es por eso que logra venderlos en su totalidad en poco tiempo.
